thread.title: Greenpeace applauds Apple’s renewable energy commitment in China urges competitors to follow
thread.title_full: Greenpeace applauds Apple’s renewable energy commitment in China urges competitors to follow

title: Greenpeace applauds Apple’s renewable energy commitment in China urges competitors to follow
text:
Greenpeace applauds Apple’s renewable energy commitment in China, urges competitors to follow 
Dominican Today Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Beijing.- In response to Apple's announcement that it will work with its partners in China to push to use renewable energy for the manufacturing of Apple products, Greenpeace USA Senior IT Sector Analyst, Gary Cook said: "We need governments and companies to transition us to renewable energy as rapidly as possible, and Apple's announcement today is a major step forward in building a renewably powered supply chain for its products. We have seen Apple lead the sector in building a renewably powered internet, and hope that Samsung, Microsoft, and other IT companies will follow their lead in ma...
